title: New ranked season
body:
New season, same trolls.

Now before you all down vote me because real talk hours, hear me out (for once).

in the 5 placement games i've had, i've had 20 trolls.

Most of them intentional feeders.
I'd have to say there have been 15 intentional feeders (standing there and letting the enemy team kill them). 
And roughly 7 afks (2, of course, over lapping for those who aren't bright).
I'm yet to see, of 20 reports, 1 to go through and successfully ban one.

BUT we both know that won't happen.
Riot condones trolls. They sit there and go, and I quote, "They've done nothing wrong".
Then you got people who want to climb. They get stuck with these delinquents and suffer for it. I'm seeing people get chat restrictions and hearing of perma bans for people who actually want to climb, myself included. 

I got a chat ban for saying Leeroy Jenkins. Someone was going to be permabanned for playing a non meta support. People who name and shame in the name of making the community better are censored.

Ritos as crooked and Killary and we both know it. 
Now the board mods will rush to Ritos erection and ride it just because they have a daddy kink, and defend them because they refuse to admit riot have no faults magically. These, are funnily, the same people who don't actually play with the community, they just sit there being trashy people and trashy players. 

You all can deny it as much as you want and argue it with no evidence like you have before like the SJW cucks you are, but we both know i'm right.

replies.body:
> ...15 intentional feeders...And roughly 7 afks

**Game 1 (playing Darius):**
Questionable scores are **Darius **(3/8/1), **Kha'Zix **(2/6/2) and **Thresh **(0/5/9). All are well within reason for a loss, not even necessarily a bad loss.
Build time, gold earned and map presence is consistent throughout the game for all three. 
No intent feeders or afks on ally team.

**Game 2 (playing Taric):**
**No** questionable scores.
Build time, gold earned and map presence is consistent throughout the game for all three. 
No intent feeders or afks on ally team.

**Game 3 (playing Sejuani):**
Questionable scores are **Swain** (2/7/12), **Sejuani** (3/10/21), **Ashe** (8/11/8). High assists on Swain and Sejuani. Ashe score consistent with a loss.
Build time, gold earned and map presence is consistent throughout the game for all three. 
No intent feeders or afks on ally team.

**Game 4 (Playing Darius)**
Questionable Scores are **Ashe** (9/10/6) and **Morgana** (2/10/13). High teamfight presence on Morgana. Scores consistent with lost lane.
Build time, gold earned and map presence is consistent throughout the game for all three. 
No intent feeders or afks on ally team.

**Game 5 (Playing Varus)**
Questionable scores are **Varus **(4/10/4), **Lee** (7/17/4), **Zed** (4/11/6). Lee and Zed scores consistent with fed enemy mid and top. Varus deaths appear to have occurred in later game, consistent with good enemy teamfight focus.
Build time, gold earned and map presence is consistent throughout the game for all three. 
No intent feeders or afks on ally team.
___
> ...and I quote...

Means little without context, if you would like to discuss a specific case you are welcome to point us in that direction.

> perma bans for people who actually want to climb

Permanent suspensions are issues for negative behaviour, cheating, boosting and the like. Permanent suspensions are not issued for climbing.

> I got a chat ban for saying Leeroy Jenkins

If such is the case then it is a false restriction, and you can have/could have had the restriction reversed via ticketing player support. Alternatively you can post the chat logs for the restriction in question and we can let you know what would have triggered it.

> permabanned for playing a non meta support

The threat of permanent suspension was an error of miscommunication that was admitted and revoked.

> People who name and shame in the name of making the community better are censored.

Good intentions or no, naming and shaming helps nobody. It risks witch hunts for players that may or may not be guilty and encourages holding grudges and not moving on from a negative situation once everything that needs to be done has been, which is not ideal. Naming and shaming causes more problems than it solves.

> because they refuse to admit riot have no faults

Presumably there was not meant to be a "no" there. Riot do have faults. They made a mistake with the Singed player when they threatened permanent suspension. They need more transparency in the report/punishment systems and in decisions like dynamic queue. Their biggest fault lies in their communication with the players. Comparatively (relative to other gaming companies) they do very well.

> people who don't actually play with the community

Boards moderation on OCE is largely managed by volunteers, all of whom are active players across all levels of play.
___
I hope the evidence I have provided is sufficient for you to consider a different perspective.

This is anything but real talk. You've just exaggerated and lied about your placement games, then proceeded to irrelevantly talk about US politics.

As Trump would say "Sad!".

___*

There's so much wrong with this post, but let's address the main issue.

> _"in the 5 placement games i've had, i've had 20 trolls"_.


+ 20 "trolls" on your team in the space of 5 games is only possible if EVERYONE on your team was a "troll" in all 5 games.

 How about the 14/5/8 **Ezreal** from your Sejuani game, was he a intentional feeder? What about the 9/3/3 **Lux**? Or the 8/3/6 **LeBlanc**?

They didn't AFK either by the way, their EXP and CS rates are constantly rising. For example, [here is Ezreal's EXP graph](https://i.gyazo.com/fee6a89ade4fc48504deecfe931a0f8f.png ). If he did AFK it would have been super briefly.

You just straight up lied, or your definition of a troll is meaningless. 
__*

If you want to make a point about trolls in ranked, I'm with you 100%. League does have a toxicity issue and it's got to be fixed, no excuses. But when you lie and call people _"SJW cucks" _ you just make it harder for people to take this issue seriously.

I loose faith in the community when I see people act like this. I really hope you're trolling.
